[event]
# Teleport to Mountain Path
type=on_trigger
location=11,31,8,1
intermap=maps/mountainpath.txt,16,1

[event]
# Teleport to Volcano2
type=on_trigger
location=0,15,1,5
intermap=maps/volcano2.txt,30,28

[event]
# Teleport to Volcano3
type=on_trigger
location=31,14,1,6
=
intermap=maps/volcano3.txt,1,15

[event]
# Locked door
type=on_trigger
location=19,17,1,1
hotspot=location
mapmod=object,19,17,0;collision,19,17,0
repeat=false
requires_status=skelkey
tooltip=Locked Gate

[enemy]
# Skeleton Knight
type=skeletonknight
location=14,14,1,1

[enemy]
# Skeleton Knight
type=skeletonknight
location=28,16,1,1
